resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81735</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81735</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4748</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Making a Pop-Up Shape</string>
            <string language="es">Creación de una forma emergente</string>
            <string language="ga">Cruth Mír Aníos a Dhéanamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Bilden Knallen-Oben Form</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La fabrication Sautent-Vers le haut la forme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazer Estala-Acima a forma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rendere Schiocca -In su la figura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή μιας υπερεμφανιζόμενης μορφής</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Info on the drawing, cutting and folding techniques involved in making a pop-up shape. Provides for useful interplay between the drawing and the visuo-tactile stimuli.</string>
            <string language="es">Información sobre las técnicas de dibujo, corte y doblado para crear una forma emergente. Ofrece una interacción útil entre los dibujos y los estímulos visuales-táctiles.</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolas faoi theicnící atá i gceist maidir le tarraingt, gearradh agus filleadh cruth mír aníos. Cuireann sé idiroibriú úsáideach ar fáil idir an tarraingt agus an spreagadh visuo-tactile.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Technical Graphics</string>
            <string language="es">Gráficos técnicos. Proyecto</string>
            <string language="ga">Grafaic Theicniúil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Project</string>
            <string language="ga">Tionscadal</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Info auf den Zeichnung, Ausschnitt- und 
Faltetechniken mit einbezogen, wenn eine pop-up Form gebildet wird. 
Stellt für nützliche Wechselwirkung zwischen der Zeichnung und
den Visuotastauslöseimpulsen zur Verfügung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Information sur les techniques de schéma, de 
découpage et de pliage impliquées en faisant une forme instantanée.
Prévoit l'effet utile entre le schéma et les stimulus 
visuo-tactiles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Info nas técnicas do desenho, do corte e da 
dobradura envolvidas em fazer uma forma pop-up. Fornece para o 
interplay útil entre o desenho e os stimuli visuo-táteis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Info sulle tecniche dell'illustrazione, di taglio
e di piegatura addette a fare una figura pop-up. Provvede 
all'interazione utile fra l'illustrazione e gli stimoli visuo-tattili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες στο σχέδιο, την κοπή και το δίπλωμα των 
τεχνικών που περιλαμβάνονται στην παραγωγή μιας υπερεμφανιζόμενης 
μορφής. Επιτρέπει τη χρήσιμη αλληλεπίδραση μεταξύ του 
σχεδίου και των βησuο-αφής ερεθισμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technische Graphiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Graphiques Techniques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gráficos Técnicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grafici Tecnici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνική γραφική παράσταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
